mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.gift_name AS "giftName", a.goods_count AS "goodsCount", a.create_by AS "createBy.name", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.name", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.show_goods_price AS "showGoodsPrice", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.gift_category AS "giftCategory", a.coupon_count AS "couponCount", c.category_name AS "giftCategoryName", c.gift_price AS "giftCategoryPrice"
LEFT JOIN sys_user u4 ON u4.id = a.create_by left join gift_config_category c on c.id = a.gift_category
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gift_config( id, gift_name, goods_count, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, show_goods_price, del_flag, remarks, gift_category, coupon_count ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{giftName}, #{goodsCount}, #{createBy.name}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.name}, #{updateDate}, #{showGoodsPrice}, #{delFlag}, #{remarks}, #{giftCategory}, #{couponCount} )
mapper.update: UPDATE gift_config SET gift_name = #{giftName}, goods_count = #{goodsCount}, update_by = #{updateBy.name}, update_date = #{updateDate}, show_goods_price = #{showGoodsPrice}, remarks = #{remarks}, gift_category = #{giftCategory}, coupon_count = #{couponCount} WHERE id = #{id}
